amendment.description: Amendment allows the USDA to assess a nominal fee (maximum of $50) per loan under the Section 502 single family guaranteed home loan program in order to fund needed technological improvements and investments into the guaranteed underwriting system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 5 printed in House Report 114-411 to allow the USDA to assess a nominal fee (maximum of $50) per loan under the Section 502 single family guaranteed home loan program in order to fund needed technological improvements and investments into the guaranteed underwriting system.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinojosa amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hinojosa amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Hinojosa.
